div.p: Translation: from P.Oxy. 12 Paid the tax of 1/50 for the present 5th year of Hadrianus Caesar the lord on export at the village of Sin..tape by ... son of Stephanus, inhabitant of Ibion Tan.e.... re√¥s, upon twenty-five artabae of fenugreek, total fen. 25 art. I received the due amount of the tax through Tothes, nomophylax, on Phaophi 21.
